amendatorysection.catchline: Secretary of State; match and verify citizenship of registered voter; Attorney General; Department of Motor Vehicles; cooperate.
amendatorysection.para: The Secretary of State shall develop a process to use the information in possession of or available to his or her office to match and verify the citizenship of the corresponding registered voter. The Attorney General and the Department of Motor Vehicles shall cooperate with the Secretary of State for such purpose. The Secretary of State may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out this section.
